title: Powers of redevelopment corporations
context: ยง53-26 Powers of redevelopment corporations. Each redevelopment corporation shall have and may exercise such of the powers conferred by the general corporation laws as are necessary in conducting the business of a redevelopment corporation and consistent with this part. [L 1949, c 379, ยง9; RL 1955, ยง143-25; HRS ยง53-26]
